about_the_game:
Note:

This is a small DLC designed for VR. It doesn't change the games story. But it gives you something new and fun to play with:


"This royal artifact will strike fear into the hearts of you enemies and legitimate your claim to the throne!
According to legend, it rules even over gravity."
And the best part: If you buy now, you get a second one for free!! x)

Magic Toilet Brush[TM]...
  • ...is just like an ordinary toilet brush... but MAGIC!
  • ...charges other items with lightning and makes them float like in zero gravity!
  • ...is the perfect weapon for every aspiring Jedi! (Especially for those who just can't afford a lightsaber right now...)
  • ...plays magical music...But only for those who know how to listen...
  • ...is rumored to have hidden fireworks thrusters! Wait... If that's thrue, does that mean it can fly?!! There has got to be a way to activate them!
  • ...has an ultimate ability: Supports us and shows us, that you like the game!


For those without VR:

This DLC is designed for VR and its not as much fun in desktop mode than it is in VR!
If you don't own a VR Headset, please only by this if you like the game and want to support us!

Note:

This is a small DLC designed for VR. It doesn't change the games story. But it gives you something new and fun to play with:


"This royal artifact will strike fear into the hearts of you enemies and legitimate your claim to the throne!
According to legend, it rules even over gravity."
And the best part: If you buy now, you get a second one for free!! x)

Magic Toilet Brush[TM]...
  • ...is just like an ordinary toilet brush... but MAGIC!
  • ...charges other items with lightning and makes them float like in zero gravity!
  • ...is the perfect weapon for every aspiring Jedi! (Especially for those who just can't afford a lightsaber right now...)
  • ...plays magical music...But only for those who know how to listen...
  • ...is rumored to have hidden fireworks thrusters! Wait... If that's thrue, does that mean it can fly?!! There has got to be a way to activate them!
  • ...has an ultimate ability: Supports us and shows us, that you like the game!


For those without VR:

This DLC is designed for VR and its not as much fun in desktop mode than it is in VR!
If you don't own a VR Headset, please only by this if you like the game and want to support us!
name: VR Flush - Magic Toilet Brush (VR)

package_groups.name: default
package_groups.title: Buy VR Flush - Magic Toilet Brush (VR)

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 8.1 or higher
  • Processor: Intel i3-6100 / AMD Ryzen 3 1200, FX4350 or higher
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 or AMD Radeon R9 290
  • Storage: 10 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: DLC Works in desktop mode as well, but was designed for VR!
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Its just like your toilet brush at home... But MAGIC! This royal artifact will strike fear into the hearts of you enemies and legitimate your claim to the throne! According to legend, it rules even over gravity. And the best part: If you buy now, you get a second one for free!!
